content.question: With capital held constant, when Zane employs one additional worker, the marginal product of labor decreases by <math alttext="5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn></math> units. Which economic concept best characterizes Zaneâ€™s production process?

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
